member.name: M:SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.ControlInterface(SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.Fill,System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox@)
member.summary: Convenience method to fill a ComboBox with all currently existing backupTypes or snRules. Also includes a "New..." item at top to facilitate adding backupTypes or snRules respectively.

member.name: M:SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.ControlInterface(SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.Fill,System.Windows.Forms.ListBox@)
member.summary: Convenience method to fill a ListBox with all currently existing backupTypes or snRules. Also includes a "New..." item at top to facilitate adding backupTypes or snRules respectively.

member.name: M:SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.ControlInterface(SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.AddUpdate,System.String,System.Windows.Forms.ListBox@)
member.summary: Interface for adding or updating backupTypes. Abstracts the lower-level direct adding or updating of backupTypes.

member.name: M:SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.ControlInterface(SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass.Selection,System.String,System.Windows.Forms.ListBox@)
member.summary: Convenience method for selecting corresponding snRules in a ListBox based on backupTypeName given.

member.name: T:SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataHandlerClass
member.summary:
Keeps track of all data processes (data integrity, adds, updates, and deletes) This class instantiates subclasses of ComboBoxInterfaceClass and ListBoxInterfaceClass These are defined in TapeDataHandlerInterfaceClasses.vb
FileIO processes are defined in TapeDataHandlerFileIO.vb which is part of this class

member.name: P:SecureSyncWrapper.TapeDataTypes.BackupTypeStruct.DefaultReturnDateType
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Default Return Date Type
member.returns: ReturnDateType Constant representing type of Return Date
